name: 04-hello-jsdom-web-scraping-on-dynamic-pages
description: Web scraping on dynamic pages using jsdom and jquery

scripts.copy: cp -r public/src/ build/ && cp -r public/rsrc build/rsrc/
scripts.dev: nodemon --ext js,json,yml --watch public/src --watch .eslintrc.yml --exec 'npm run build --silent && npm start --silent'
